Message: The user completes the submission of the form

our ad creatives in the most recent campaign have been rejected due to a brand name. we are running ads for an affiliate offer, hence the brand name is different. can you take a look, let us know how we can launch these ads on newsbreak? thank you

I'm sorry to hear that your ad creatives were rejected. It sounds like the issue might be related to our Ad Policy, specifically regarding the use of brand names and trademarks. Advertisers are prohibited from using logos, brand elements, or any visual or textual identities in a manner that suggests or implies any form of affiliation, endorsement, or sponsorship with the trademark owner when no such relationship officially exists. This includes but is not limited to, the use of these elements in advertising, promotional materials, or on any product packaging. I recommend reviewing our Ad Policy for detailed guidelines on this matter. You can find it here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions or need assistance with your specific case, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.

send a proper invoice with the company details for the following transaction:
1874246336021815297
Sure, I can help with that. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the transaction details and your company information. They will assist you in generating a proper invoice.
